title: Four cyclometalated Ir(III) complexes and insights into their luminescence, cytotoxicity and DNA/BSA binding performance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29934-29941
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04408H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qianshui Yu, Shunxin Gu, Xinda Yang, Qin Jiang, Pengfei Shi
Four cyclometalated Ir(III) complexes based on 4′-p-N,N-bis(2-hydroxyethyl)benzyl-2,2′:6′,2′′-terpyridine (TPYOH) and 4′-p-N,N-bis(2-hydroxyethyl)benzyl-6′-benzyl-2,2′-bipyridine (PhbpyOH) were synthesized and characterized.
